title: nalidADe enna
sahitya:
nalidADe enna nAlige mElesarasvati dEvi kuNidADe enna nAlige mEle


anupallavi

  salila jOdbhavana vadana nilayeLe iLeyoLa pratima guNa gaNAmbudhi tAye


caraNam 1    khilu khilu khilu gejjeya nAda phaLi phalire nimma hoLeva beraLungura kiNi kiNi nAda eLe mAvina taLira 
pOluva divya pAda celuva peNdeya bhEda naliva yugaLa jange jalaguLLayante jAnu thaLI thaLisuva toDe hoLeva suguNiye
    caraNam 2    dinakara kOTi tEjati hoLeva anupama vAda kanaka vasanadinda eseva ghanavAda jaghanaga ganadandadi sundara 
kaTiyali mereva maNidAma vibhava tanu jaTharavu jAhnavi suLI nAbhiyu ghana stanayugaLa candana lEpitaLe
    caraNam 3    duNDa muttina koraLa hAra uddaNDa maNI pracaNDa miNI miNisuva honnina sara karirAja pOtana soNDilinante 
bhujada bhAra naDave oyyAra maNDita vAda kankaNa tOL baLegaLu duNDu havaLa kai kaTTULLavaLe
    caraNam 4    nasunagu mukhavu nAsAbharaNa esave kapOla hosa kuNDala caLatumbuLLa shravaNa bisajadaLadante eseva karNAnta
vAda nayana tilakada hasana shshi sUryara AbharaNa su-shObhite kusuma muDida mUrdhajavuLLavaLe
    caraNam 5    singAravAda jaDe bhangAra hongyAdige muDida bhangArada heraLina rAkaTivara bhrngAda svara hingade bhaktara 
salahuva bhAra kangaLa manOhara ranga purandara viTTala rAyana mangaLa mUrtiya dore shubAngi
